TextView.android:text:
1. How do I pay for cylinder booking?
 -> You can now pay for your Gas cylinder on this Mobile App in Book Now Section.You will also get notification on succesfull payment.

 2. Where do I find my LPG ID?
 -> LPG ID is used to identify customers uniquely. You can find your LPG ID on Customer ID Card along.

 3. When will I receive my LPG cylinder?
 -> Once you have paid for your LPG cylinder on this app, it takes upto 7 days for the cylinder to get delivered.

 4. How can I contact the LPG provider?
 -> contact no. - 95236xxxxx and 91291xxxxx

 5. What are the Payment method available?
 -> CashOnDelivery and UPI

 6. How to change my password?
 -> You can change your password on edit section. This require your LPG ID.

 7. How do we change the name of connection holder?
 -> Once the account has been created,you cannot modify the username section.

 8. How to delete my account?
 -> You can DELETE your ACCOUNT on edit section. This require your LPG ID.
